name: Good Humor (80g Final)
description:
Good Humor is a 2-4 player card game, where each player takes on the role of a plague doctor, using whatever resources they have to cure various patients by balancing their humors. However, in the pursuit of fame or profit, doing harm may prove to be more advantageous. 

PlayingCards.io: https://playingcards.io/tx2y9e
